visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have custom styling for axes and labels, including specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data for a year, with each month as a category on the X-axis. Additionally, the chart should have a custom color scheme and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes custom styling for the axes and labels, with specific colors and font sizes applied to the titles and labels. The data series represents monthly rainfall data for a year, with each month listed as a category on the X-axis. The chart also features a custom color scheme, with a blue color applied to the data series. Additional configurations include settings for chart margins, background color, and legend, ensuring a visually appealing and informative chart layout.
